sentences.english: Horizontal press device is controlled by electricity and foot switch. Worktable Increases automatically.

sentences.english: Long term yields marginally higher in the UK and Europe but little changed in the US.

sentences.english: For luminescence counting, order the manual syringe lid and Microliter TM syringe.
sentences.chinese: 對於冷光計數，需另購手動式注射器蓋和微升注射器。
